name: To Start Anew
description:
After having made one hell of a mess, Brenna's whole sense of self has come undone. She's pushed by a friend to skip town and let the dust settle, but she's torn between leaving it all behind for good and coming back to make amends.

In her new town, she meets Angie, who takes her under her wing, but who has her own ideas of how Brenna should change.

In the end it's up to the player to make the big decision.
